content:
Diagnosis:
Perihilar cholangiocarcinoma with local vascular invasion
ERBB2 (HER2) amplified on molecular testing

Previous treatment:
Endoscopic stenting March 2024
Commenced Trastuzumab-Pertuzumab with Gemcitabine-Cisplatin April 2024

Current medications:
Ondansetron 8mg bd
Dexamethasone 4mg bd (days 1-4 of cycle)
Ursodeoxycholic acid 500mg tds

Allergies:
None known

Current situation:
Pre cycle 3 of combination therapy

Bilirubin stable at 28
CA19-9 trending down from 890 to 425

CT 15 May 2024 - stable appearances of perihilar mass with patent biliary stent

Tolerated cycles 1-2 with grade 2 fatigue and grade 1 nausea. Performance status remains 1. No clinical evidence of disease progression. Latest blood tests show stable liver function with bilirubin 28, ALT 65, ALP 225. Platelets adequate at 178. Renal function remains normal with creatinine 82.

Plan is to proceed with cycle 3 today maintaining current doses. Will arrange repeat CT after cycle 4 to formally assess response. Follow up in 3 weeks with blood tests including CA19-9.
